text: Groupe Scolaire Maïmonide Rambam, named for the medieval philosopher Maimonides, is a Jewish private school in Boulogne-Billancourt, France, in the Paris metropolitan area. It serves levels maternelle (preschool) until lycée (senior high school). It was established as Ecole Maïmonide in 1935. In 1939 it closed as a result of World War II but reopened in 1944 after the Nazi- established ban on Jewish institutions was lifted."Historique." Groupe Scolaire Maïmonide Rambam. title: Groupe Scolaire Maïmonide Rambam
